disk_analyzer.stages.data_collector module

class disk_analyzer.stages.data_collector.DataCollector(paths: List[str] | None = [], storage_path: str = './Data_collected', batchsize: int = 500000, cfgpath: str = './analyzer_cfg.json')[source]

Bases: object

Class responsible for collecting the data.

Accepts paths to various data sources, splits the data into batches, and copies it into storage.

Parameters:

  • paths (list) – List of paths to various data sources.

  • storage_path (str) – Path to storage of batches.

  • batchsize (int) – Number of samples to be stored in one batch.

  • cfgpath (str) –

    Path to configuration file. If not provided, checks in the current folder. Configuration file has higher priority than parameters from the constructor. Configuration file is a JSON file with the following structure: {

    ”batchsize”: number of samples in one batch, “paths”: list of paths to various data sources

    }

batch_resize()[source]

Rearrange the data in existing storage to match new batch size

collect_data()[source]

Collects the data from various sources and stores it in batchesbatches. Creates two categorial features: ‘brand’ and ‘model’.

Class that encodes categorical columns.

fit(X, y=None)[source]
transform(X: pandas.DataFrame, y=None) → pandas.DataFrame[source]
class disk_analyzer.stages.data_preprocessor.DataPreprocessor(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]

Bases: BaseEstimator, TransformerMixin

Train data preprocessor class .

Preprocessing steps:

  1. Change date column to time

  2. Delete disks with more than one event

  3. Delete duplicates(observation with the same disk number and time)

  4. Drop columns with big percentage of NaN values and explicitely specified.

  5. Impute NaN values

  6. Vectorize categorical data

  7. Standardize data

If new data is added, previously truncated disks may be added.

disk_analyzer.stages.model_pipeline module

class disk_analyzer.stages.model_pipeline.ModelPipeline(data_paths: List[str], model: sklearn.linear_model.LogisticRegression | sklearn.svm.SVC | DLClassifier | None = None, train_test_splitter: TrainTestSplitter | None = None, data_preprocessor: DataPreprocessor | None = None, rm_truncated_from_test: bool = True, batchsize: int = 500000, prep_storage_path: str = './Data/preprocessed', model_params: Dict | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Class that incorporates all pipeline logic Consists of the following stages:

  1. Data Preprocessor: split data into train and test, preprocess data

  2. Model: train and predict

  3. Scoring: get metrics

Fit model
